company.name: OpenAI
company.description: OpenAI是一家领先的人工智能研究公司，专注于开发安全、有益的通用人工智能。公司成立于2015年，总部位于美国旧金山，以开发GPT系列大语言模型和ChatGPT而闻名全球。

projects.name: ChatGPT
projects.description: Advanced conversational AI assistant powered by GPT-4, capable of natural language understanding, code generation, creative writing, and complex reasoning tasks.

projects.name: GPT-4
projects.description: Large multimodal language model capable of processing text and images, with advanced reasoning capabilities and improved accuracy.

projects.name: DALL-E 3
projects.description: Advanced AI image generation model that creates high-quality images from text descriptions with improved accuracy and creativity.

company.name: Anthropic
company.description: Anthropic是一家专注于AI安全的公司，致力于开发有益、无害、诚实的AI系统。公司由OpenAI前研究副总裁创立，以开发Claude AI助手而闻名。

projects.name: Claude
projects.description: Advanced AI assistant designed with constitutional AI principles, featuring enhanced safety, helpfulness, and honesty in conversations and tasks.

company.name: Google
company.description: Google是Alphabet旗下的科技巨头，在人工智能领域投入巨大，开发了Gemini、Bard等AI产品，并在搜索、云计算、自动驾驶等领域广泛应用AI技术。

projects.name: Gemini
projects.description: Google's most advanced AI model with multimodal capabilities, supporting text, image, audio, and video processing with enhanced reasoning and creativity.

projects.name: Google AI Studio
projects.description: Development platform for building and prototyping with Google's AI models, offering easy integration and testing capabilities.

company.name: Microsoft
company.description: Microsoft是全球领先的科技公司，在AI领域投入巨大，开发了Copilot系列产品，并与OpenAI建立了战略合作关系，将AI技术深度集成到Office、Azure等产品中。

projects.name: Microsoft Copilot
projects.description: AI-powered productivity assistant integrated across Microsoft 365 suite, providing intelligent assistance for writing, analysis, and automation tasks.

projects.name: Azure AI
projects.description: Comprehensive AI platform on Microsoft Azure cloud, offering machine learning, cognitive services, and AI infrastructure for enterprises.

company.name: DeepSeek
company.description: DeepSeek是中国领先的AI公司，专注于大语言模型和代码生成技术，开发了DeepSeek-Coder等产品，在代码生成和AI推理方面表现优异。

projects.name: DeepSeek-Coder
projects.description: Advanced AI coding assistant specialized in code generation, debugging, and software development with support for multiple programming languages.

company.name: Midjourney
company.description: Midjourney是一家专注于AI图像生成的创新公司，开发了同名AI艺术创作平台，以其独特的艺术风格和高质量的图像生成能力而闻名。

projects.name: Midjourney
projects.description: Leading AI image generation platform with painterly aesthetic, advanced prompt engineering, and community-driven improvements for creative professionals.

company.name: Stability AI
company.description: Stability AI是一家开源AI公司，开发了Stable Diffusion等开源图像生成模型，致力于让AI技术更加开放和可访问。

projects.name: Stable Diffusion
projects.description: Open-source AI image generation model with community-driven improvements, ControlNet support, and unlimited customizations for developers and artists.

company.name: Hugging Face
company.description: Hugging Face是领先的AI模型平台和社区，为开发者提供机器学习模型的分享、训练和部署服务，是开源AI生态的重要推动者。

projects.name: Hugging Face Hub
projects.description: Leading AI model platform and community for sharing, training, and deploying machine learning models and datasets with comprehensive tools and resources.

company.name: Runway
company.description: Runway是一家专注于AI视频生成和编辑的创新公司，开发了Gen-3等先进的视频生成模型，为内容创作者提供强大的AI工具。

projects.name: Runway Gen-3
projects.description: Advanced AI video generation and editing platform with Gen-3 model for cinematic video creation and motion graphics with professional-grade quality.

company.name: ElevenLabs
company.description: ElevenLabs是一家专注于AI语音生成和克隆技术的公司，提供逼真的语音合成服务，广泛应用于内容创作和多媒体制作。

projects.name: ElevenLabs Voice AI
projects.description: Leading AI voice generation and cloning platform with realistic speech synthesis and emotion control for content creators and multimedia professionals.
